items.sentence: Something like this doesn't happen every day.
I have evidence that Tom stole the gum drops.
Tom got a ticket for violating a traffic law.
Tom listens to the news on a shortwave radio.
It didn't take long for Tom to figure it out.
We have choir rehearsals every day this week.
Tom isn't a dentist. He's a dental assistant.
They say Tom is the smartest one on the team.
You'll fall behind if you keep missing class.
All mushrooms are edible, but some only once.
How many animals can you name that hibernate?
Bears aren't the only animals that hibernate.
What's the best time of year to visit Boston?
To see him talk, you might think he's a girl.
Upon hearing the news, she broke down crying.
English is like a world-wide common language.
Mother went shopping at the department store.
The last one to go home will probably be Tom.
Doing that won't be as difficult as it looks.
Let's get out of here and go someplace quiet.
